Key Match Events: The Boston Red Sox needed extra-innings, but they beat the Detroit Tigers 7-5 on Friday night at Comerica Park.
Kenley Jansen earned the win in relief while Chris Martin got the save.
Jarren Duran went 3-for-5 with two doubles and a home run.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Red Sox remain 3.5 games back of the third and final wild card spot in the American League after the victory.
Jarren Duran is chasing some prestigious Red Sox history, having 75 extra-base hits as a leadoff hitter in 2024.
